Posts.Content: Hyra wrote: I am a quadriplegic since many years, recently diagnosed with right breast IDC. Went throught my first chemo (AC)session which lead me into a severe emergency condition. I had shortness of breath, pain and distension in my upper abdomen, nausea, high bp, congestion in my chest and pain in my left side chest.Do anyone know about this condition? If yes, can someone suggest on it? Your help n information sharing would be much appreciated Thanks Chemotherapy 10/23/2017 AC Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Post chemo side effects in quadriplegics Hyra beauz
